categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles Mini Movies

nodes.text: The Hunt For Luke Skywalker is a two-minute LEGO Mini Movie that is connected to LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles animated TV series. It is the seventh video and was released on YouTube on August 6, 2014.

While sleeping in his meditation chamber, Darth Vader is roused by Emperor Palpatine, who tells him that he owes him Luke Skywalker. Vader informs Palpatine that his spies have told him that bounty hunters are close to finding Skywalker. The Emperor replies "I hope so for your sake."

Vader then contacts the bounty hunters by comlink but they have all seen no sign of Luke. The bounty hunters include Cad Bane, Bossk, and an AWOL Clone scout trooper on Kashyyyk who is pretending to be a Wookiee. Vader is then contacted by an RA-7 protocol droid who tells him that Luke and his companions are at Docking Bay 94. The rebels then board the Millennium Falcon. Thinking he has Luke in his grasp, Vader does a victory dance.
When he sees the stormtroopers watching, Vader tells them that anyone who laughs will be tossed through the wall. The stormtroopers struggle to contain their laughter.
